items.badge_description: Raise a toast and give thanks to all who have bravely served around the world, past and present. Here's to you!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer from 11/9/18 to 11/12/18 in your local timezone.

items.badge_description: Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Sometimes you need a break from all the hops, fruits, and spices. What better way than with a crisp, smooth Blonde Ale or Golden Ale? Basic but delicious. That's 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with the style of Blonde Ale or Golden Ale. Please note that badges are not retroactive, please review the start date to find out when this badge started.

items.badge_description: Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Canning is all the rage and it's not hard to see why - travels well, more environmentally friendly, and no need to carry your bottle opener. That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Can. Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 times with the serving style of Can.

items.badge_description: Cheers to eight years of checking in beers! Thank you for continuing to discover, sip, and share with us!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to any beer between October 19 - 22, 2018. Thanks for your support!

items.badge_description: You're getting the hang of it, but there’s much more to try. That’s over 50 unique brews!
items.badge_hint: Try lots of different brews!

items.badge_description: Beer is often better with friends. Besides, drinking socially is what we're all about! You've checked in with at least 10 other people within 5 hours.
items.badge_hint: Check-in to a location with at least 10 others within 5 hours.

items.badge_description: 99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 2!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 5 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in 5 times adding the serving style of Bottle.

items.badge_description: You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 5 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale, try 5 more for Level 2.

You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 5 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale, try 5 more for Level 2.
items.badge_hint: Check in to 5 different Saisons, Grisettes or Sour - Farmhouse Ale.

items.badge_description: Drinking with friends is fun. Right? You've checked in with at least 4 other people within 2 hours.
items.badge_hint: Drink socially and at a venue.

items.badge_description: First brewed in the early 16th century, this peculiar flavored beer has made quite the come back. With a tart, salty combination, your taste buds are probably still tingling... and excited for more! That's 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Try 5 more for Level 2!

First brewed in the early 16th century, this peculiar flavored beer has made quite the come back. With a tart, salty combination, your taste buds are probably still tingling... and excited for more! That's 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different beers with the style of Gose. Please note that badges are not retroactive, please review the start date to find out when this badge started.

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 5)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 6!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 4)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 5!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 3)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 4!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 2)
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 4 more to earn Level 3!

items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries
items.badge_description: Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 2!

Cheers, beer patriot! You are supporting the small and independent American craft brewer. When you see the seal -- shaped like an upside-down beer bottle -- that's independence you're tasting. Try 5 more to earn Level 6!
items.badge_name: Cheers to Independent U.S. Craft Breweries (Level 5)
items.badge_hint: Check-in 1 beer from a list of small and independent U.S. craft breweries between 9/20/18 - 9/20/19. A full list can be found on our blog.

items.badge_description: Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 2!

Wine isn't the only beverage worthy of pairing with a delicious meal. With so many styles widely available, there’s a perfect pint for any cuisine of your choosing. That's a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a Restaurant. Try 5 more for Level 2!
items.badge_hint: Check-in a beer at 5 different venues categorized as a "Restaurant". This includes everything under the parent category of "Food".

items.badge_description: Friends are gathered, steaks are sizzling on the grill, and you’re sipping a cold, crisp Guinness Blonde Lager. Here’s to keeping those summer vibes going all year long.
items.badge_hint: Check-in to one (1) Guinness Blonde Lager between 6/25/18 - 9/25/18.

items.badge_description: Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 10 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 5 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 2.

Right about now you’re feeling your face tighten and your taste buds explode. The full pucker is quickly setting in and you can’t get enough. This is the wonder of the sour. That's 10 different Sour Beers. Try 5 more for Level 3.
items.badge_hint: Check-in to 5 different sour beers. A sour beer on Untappd is any beer with a style of the following: American Wild Ale, Lambic or Sour.

items.badge_description: Looks like you're getting around. You've enjoyed at least 25 different beers!
items.badge_hint: Try lots of different brews!

items.badge_description: Instead of a spot of tea, why not enjoy a proper pint. That doesn’t mean you can't get all dressed up for it, so throw on your fanciest hat and enjoy that brew!
items.badge_hint: Try five (5) pints instead of tea between 4PM & 6PM within a calendar month in your local timezone.

items.badge_description: Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 10 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 3.
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 5 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 2.
Ahh, the trusty pale ale; crisp, refreshing, and always a good choice in a bind. That's 10 different Pale Ales. Try 5 more for Level 3.
items.badge_hint: Check into 5 different Pale Ales (Imperial Pales, American Pale Ales, New Zealand Pale Ale).

items.badge_description: It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.
It takes the perfect amount of light, the right framing and a touch of creative love to get the perfect picture of your brew. Now it’s time to drink it! That’s 5 check-ins with a photo.
items.badge_hint: Add a photo to your check-in 5 times. You must check-in to get this badge, adding a photo to an existing check-in counts, but you will need to check-in with a photo to unlock the badge.

items.badge_description:
Everyone loves fresh beer, but obviously not as much as you do. You went straight to the source. 

That's a beer at 15 different venues categorized as a Brewery. Visit 5 more different ones for Level 4!

items.badge_description: It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.
It's New Brew Thursday! Drink a new beer on three Thursdays in a 30 day period! Find out how New Brew Thursday was started, and catch up on old episodes.
items.badge_hint: Try something new for 3 Thursdays in a 30 day period. You can only level up once per 30 days.

items.badge_description: Let's raise a toast to America's Independence Day, a holiday full of friends, food, and great beer. Happy 4th of July!
items.badge_hint: Check-in any beer from an American (United States) brewery between July 3rd - July 5th. Collaborations do not count, unless the primary brewey is from the US.

items.badge_description: Supporting local breweries is what helps the craft beer scene grow. You obviously know this since you’re enjoying the local flavor! Be sure to always drink locally.

items.badge_description: Enjoying a nice Night Out on the town? Thanks for taking untappd along.
items.badge_hint: Out with Untappd? Let us you know your location and we'll give you this badge! Check in with a location from 7pm to 4am in your local timezone.

items.badge_description: So, you're new around here? Congrats on your first brew! This one's for you.
items.badge_hint: Try out Untappd - you'll get this one!
